name: Turok (2008)
description:
Turok (2008) is an action-shooter game developed by Aspyr Media and Propaganda Games. It came out on 22-04-2008. It was published by Touchstone Studios. On review aggregator Metacritic, Turok (2008) has a score of 67. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Turok (2008) on PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and PC.
